title: Wolfram Language Pilot Project for Enhanced Market Modeling

reasoning.problem: Proposal for Wolfram Language Pilot Project: Given the potential for enhanced market modeling and risk assessment identified in the inbox messages, I propose a pilot project to integrate Wolfram Language. The goal is to backtest and explore predictive analytics capabilities. Requesting budget allocation and system access for a 3-month trial period. Success will be measured by improved accuracy in market forecasts and risk identification.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
